title: How/where to buy weed, for tourists in India? Are there any Indian cities/areas where weed is legal?
selftext:
Advice needed, for American tourists visiting India. As you know, weed is legal in some parts of the US. So, many Americans are used to smoking weed several times a day.

[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cannabis\_in\_India](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Cannabis_in_India)

But. Based on the above wiki page,

*"Indian government is strict with the Cannabis policy. According to Section 20 of the NDPS Act,* ***holding a small quantity of weed can land you in jail for rigorous imprisonment of up to six months or a fine of Rs.*** ***10,000 or both***\*."\*

Is this really enforced?

[https://www.lostwithpurpose.com/weed-india/#where](https://www.lostwithpurpose.com/weed-india/#where)

Then there's this article.
comments:
Yes, it's enforced, but severity of enforcement depends on city. You can smoke it in private space, but don't even try in public spaces, you don't know what kind of cop you come across. You will be travelling in car, so not much an issue, as they don't check for weed in cars, from what I know.

Since it's banned, it would be hard to find seller on your own, especially a decent/good quality one.

Your best bet is to have some local connect or your travel agency provides you.
In Bhubaneswar you can find many shops on google maps. Government bhang shops.. marijuana (ganja) available point. Yes. Its ganja. The dried flower.
